verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to her that is filthy <WH4754> <WH8802> and polluted <WH1351> <WH8737>, to the oppressing <WH3238> <WH8802> city <WH5892> !

She obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> not the voice <WH6963>; she received <WH3947> <WH8804> not correction <WH4148>; she trusted <WH982> <WH8804> not in the YY <WH3068>; she drew not near <WH7126> <WH8804> to her 'Elohim <WH430>.

Her princes <WH8269> within <WH7130> her are roaring <WH7580> <WH8802> lions <WH738>; her judges <WH8199> <WH8802> are evening <WH6153> wolves <WH2061>; they gnaw not the bones <WH1633> <WH8804> till the morrow <WH1242>.

Her prophets <WH5030> are light <WH6348> <WH8802> and treacherous <WH900> persons <WH582>: her Kohanim <WH3548> have polluted <WH2490> <WH8765> the sanctuary <WH6944>, they have done violence <WH2554> <WH8804> to the Torah <WH8451>.

The just <WH6662> YY <WH3068> is in the midst <WH7130> thereof; he will not do <WH6213> <WH8799> iniquity <WH5766>: every <WH1242> morning <WH1242> doth he bring <WH5414> <WH8799> his judgment <WH4941> to light <WH216>, he faileth <WH5737> <WH8738> not; but the unjust <WH5767> knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> no shame <WH1322>.

I have cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> the nations <WH1471>: their towers <WH6438> are desolate <WH8074> <WH8738>; I made their streets <WH2351> waste <WH2717> <WH8689>, that none passeht by <WH5674> <WH8802>: their cities <WH5892> are destroyed <WH6658> <WH8738>, so that there is no man <WH376>, that there is none inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802>.

I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Surely thou wilt fear <WH3372> <WH8799> me, thou wilt receive <WH3947> <WH8799> instruction <WH4148>; so their dwelling <WH4583> should not be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735>, howsoever <WH834> <WH3605> I punished <WH6485> <WH8804> them: but <WH403> they rose early <WH7925> <WH8689>, and corrupted <WH7843> <WH8689> all their doings <WH5949>.

Therefore wait <WH2442> <WH8761> ye upon me, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, until the day <WH3117> that I rise up <WH6965> <WH8800> to the prey <WH5706>: for my determination <WH4941> is to gather <WH622> <WH8800> the nations <WH1471>, that I may assemble <WH6908> <WH8800> the kingdoms <WH4467>, to pour <WH8210> <WH8800> upon them mine indignation <WH2195>, even all my fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639>: for all the earth <WH776> shall be devoured <WH398> <WH8735> with the fire <WH784> of my jealousy <WH7068>.

For then will I turn <WH2015> <WH8799> to the people <WH5971> a pure <WH1305> <WH8803> language <WH8193>, that they may all call <WH7121> <WH8800> upon the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> him with one <WH259> consent <WH7926>.

From beyond <WH5676> the rivers <WH5104> of Ethiopia <WH3568> my suppliants <WH6282>, even the daughter <WH1323> of my dispersed <WH6327> <WH8803>, shall bring <WH2986> <WH8686> mine offering <WH4503>.

In that day <WH3117> shalt thou not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> for all thy doings <WH5949>, wherein thou hast transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804> against me: for then I will take away <WH5493> <WH8686> out of the midst <WH7130> of thee them that rejoice <WH5947> in thy pride <WH1346>, and thou shalt no more <WH3254> <WH8686> be haughty <WH1361> <WH8800> because of my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>.

I will also leave <WH7604> <WH8689> in the midst <WH7130> of thee an afflicted <WH6041> and poor <WH1800> people <WH5971>, and they shall trust <WH2620> <WH8804> in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.

The remnant <WH7611> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall not do <WH6213> <WH8799> iniquity <WH5766>, nor speak <WH1696> <WH8762> lies <WH3577>; neither shall a deceitful <WH8649> tongue <WH3956> be found <WH4672> <WH8735> in their mouth <WH6310>: for they shall feed <WH7462> <WH8799> and lie down <WH7257> <WH8804>, and none shall make them afraid <WH2729> <WH8688>.

Sing <WH7442> <WH8798>, O daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>; shout <WH7321> <WH8685>, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>; be glad <WH8055> <WH8798> and rejoice <WH5937> <WH8798> with all the heart <WH3820>, O daughter <WH1323> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

The YY <WH3068> hath taken away <WH5493> <WH8689> thy judgments <WH4941>, he hath cast out <WH6437> <WH8765> thine enemy <WH341> <WH8802>: the king <WH4428> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, even the YY <WH3068>, is in the midst <WH7130> of thee: thou shalt not see <WH7200> <WH8799> evil <WH7451> any more.
In that day <WH3117> it shall be said <WH559> <WH8735> to Yerushalayim <WH3389>, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> thou not: and to TZiyon <WH6726>, Let not thine hands <WH3027> be slack <WH7503> <WH8799>.

The YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> in the midst <WH7130> of thee is mighty <WH1368>; he will save <WH3467> <WH8686>, he will rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799> over thee with joy <WH8057>; he will rest <WH2790> <WH8686> in his love <WH160>, he will joy <WH1523> <WH8799> over thee with singing <WH7440>.
I will gather <WH622> <WH8804> them that are sorrowful <WH3013> <WH8737> for the solemn assembly <WH4150>, who are of thee, to whom the reproach <WH2781> of it was a burden <WH4864>.

Behold, at that time <WH6256> I will undo <WH6213> <WH8802> all that afflict <WH6031> <WH8764> thee: and I will save <WH3467> <WH8689> her that halteth <WH6760> <WH8802>, and gather <WH6908> <WH8762> her that was driven out <WH5080> <WH8737>; and I will get <WH7760> <WH8804> them praise <WH8416> and fame <WH8034> in every land <WH776> where they have been put to shame <WH1322>.

At that time <WH6256> will I bring <WH935> <WH8686> you again, even in the time <WH6256> that I gather <WH6908> <WH8763> you: for I will make <WH5414> <WH8799> you a name <WH8034> and a praise <WH8416> among all people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776>, when I turn back <WH7725> <WH8800> your captivity <WH7622> before your eyes <WH5869>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>.
